testsuite.name: 지연 로딩 테스트

testcase.name: 지연 로딩도 N + 1가 발생하지만, 호출될 때 쿼리가 날라간다. (List<Member>만 가져오고 싶을 때 유용)

testsuite.system-out:
Hibernate:
drop table EagerMember if exists Hibernate:
drop table EagerTeam if exists Hibernate:
drop table LazyMember if exists Hibernate:
drop table LazyTeam if exists Hibernate:
drop sequence if exists hibernate_sequence Hibernate: create sequence hibernate_sequence start with 1 increment by 1 Hibernate:
create table EagerMember ( id bigint not null, name varchar(255), TEAM_ID bigint, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table EagerTeam ( id bigint not null, name varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table LazyMember ( id bigint not null, name varchar(255), TEAM_ID bigint, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table LazyTeam ( id bigint not null, name varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
alter table EagerMember add constraint FK42avbaj3icx3kusod6pn36yxx foreign key (TEAM_ID) references EagerTeam Hibernate:
alter table LazyMember add constraint FKtncr08y1h3tj6dsbtg0d35rry foreign key (TEAM_ID) references LazyTeam Hibernate: call next value for hibernate_sequence Hibernate: call next value for hibernate_sequence Hibernate: call next value for hibernate_sequence Hibernate: call next value for hibernate_sequence Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.LazyTeam */ insert into LazyTeam (name, id) values (?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.LazyMember */ insert into LazyMember (name, TEAM_ID, id) values (?, ?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.LazyTeam */ insert into LazyTeam (name, id) values (?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.LazyMember */ insert into LazyMember (name, TEAM_ID, id) values (?, ?, ?) ===============쿼리가 한 번만 날라간다.=============== Hibernate: /* select m from LazyMember m */ select lazymember0_.id as id1_2_, lazymember0_.name as name2_2_, lazymember0_.TEAM_ID as TEAM_ID3_2_ from LazyMember lazymember0_ 조회할 때만 날아간다. Hibernate: select lazyteam0_.id as id1_3_0_, lazyteam0_.name as name2_3_0_ from LazyTeam lazyteam0_ where lazyteam0_.id=? Team A 조회할 때만 날아간다. Hibernate: select lazyteam0_.id as id1_3_0_, lazyteam0_.name as name2_3_0_ from LazyTeam lazyteam0_ where lazyteam0_.id=? Team B
